item.description: Riot Games unveils a new controller agent with unique smoke abilities that can block vision and deal damage.

item.title: Ranked Season 12: Meta Analysis and Top Picks
item.description: The new patch has shaken up the leaderboard. Here are the legends and loadouts you need to be running to hit Predator this season.

item.title: Fortnite World Cup 2025: $10 Million Prize Pool
item.description: Epic Games announces the biggest Fortnite tournament with record-breaking prize pool and new competitive format.
